get.summary: Method returns all Departments in the Company
Method returns Department by id

put.summary: Method updates Department information by id

get.summary: Method returns all Jobs in the Company
Method returns Job by id

put.summary: Method updates Job information by id

get.summary: Request #1 outputs all Workers of the given Department
Request #2 outputs all Workers working in more than 1 Department; the result is sorted by last name, first name, patronymic name

Request #3 outputs the archive of dismissals, including registration number, first name, last name, 
patronymic, birth date, workshop, department and job of the worker
Request #4 outputs an average age of Workers for each department
Request #5 outputs the info about Workers, who received a vacation in past year
Request #6 outputs the top-5 Workers, who have the longest working experience it the company
Method returns all Vacations in the Company
Method returns Vacation by id

put.summary: Method updates Vacation information by id

get.summary: Method returns all VacationSpots in the Company
Method returns VacationSpot by id

put.summary: Method updates VacationSpot information by id

get.summary: Method returns all Workers in the Company
Method returns Worker by id

put.summary: Method updates Worker information by id

dismissalDate.description:
DismissalDate - a date, when a Worker was dismissed from the Job
(can be 9999.12.31, if the Worker is still working on that Job)
